20001.name: Forest Edge
20001.description:
The cobblestone road ends here at the edge of a dark forest. Ancient
oaks tower overhead, their branches blocking out much of the sunlight. A
worn path leads deeper into the woods, while the safety of the city lies
to the east. Bird calls echo through the canopy. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves.

west.description: A path winds deeper into the forest.

north.description: The road leads back to Midgaard's west gate.

20002.name: Shadowy Path
20002.description:
The forest closes in around. Shafts of pale light filter through the
canopy above, creating dancing patterns on the leaf-covered ground. The
path splits here, leading north and west. The forest floor is carpeted
with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: The path leads back toward the forest edge.

north.description: The path continues north into deeper shadows.

20003.name: Dark Grove
20003.description:
The area opens in a small clearing surrounded by ancient, gnarled trees.
Strange fungi grow at the base of the trees, some glowing with a faint
phosphorescence. The air is thick with the smell of decay and growing
things. Bird calls echo through the canopy. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: The trees thin out to the north.

20004.name: Spider's Hollow
20004.description:
Thick webs stretch between the trees here, some large enough to trap a
man. The skeletal remains of small animals dangle in the sticky strands.
Something moves in the shadows above... Ancient trees rise on all sides.
The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

south.description: The path leads back through the grove.

20005.name: Mossy Trail
20005.description:
The ground here is soft with centuries of accumulated moss. Your
footsteps make no sound as you walk. Ancient stones, perhaps markers or
ruins, peek through the undergrowth. The forest floor is carpeted with
fallen leaves. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

south.description: A barely visible path leads south.

20006.name: Ruined Shrine
20006.description:
The crumbling remains of an ancient shrine stand here, overgrown with
vines and moss. A weathered statue of some forgotten deity watches over
the clearing. Offerings of coins and trinkets lie at its base. Ancient
trees rise on all sides. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: A path leads north into thicker forest.

20007.name: Wolf Den Entrance
20007.description:
The ground slopes down here toward a dark cave entrance. Fresh animal
bones are scattered about, and claw marks scar the nearby trees.
Growling echoes from within the den. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

south.description: The shrine lies to the south.

down.description: The cave entrance leads down into darkness.

20008.name: The Spider Queen's Lair
20008.description:
This chamber is choked with webs so thick they form walls. Cocooned
victims hang from the ceiling, some still twitching. At the center of
this nightmare, a massive spider waits on her throne of silk. The
ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

west.description: The tunnel leads west, back to the hollow.

20009.name: Wolf Den
20009.description:
The cave is littered with bones and scraps of fur. The smell of wolf is
overwhelming. Several sets of eyes gleam in the darkness, watching your
every move. The pack's alpha lurks at the back. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

up.description: The cave entrance leads up and out.

20010.name: Hidden Glade
20010.description:
This beautiful glade is hidden from the rest of the forest. Sunlight
streams down onto a carpet of wildflowers. A crystal-clear spring
bubbles up from the ground. The place radiates tranquility. The scent of
pine and earth fills the air. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

20001.name: forest wolf
20001.long_desc: A lean gray wolf prowls here, watching you with hungry eyes.
20001.description: This wolf is part of the forest pack. Its gray fur is matted and scarred from countless hunts.

20002.name: giant spider
20002.long_desc: A giant spider clings to a web, its many eyes watching you.
20002.description: This spider is the size of a large dog. Venom drips from its fangs.

20003.name: venomous spider
20003.long_desc: A venomous spider drops silently from the shadows.
20003.description: This spider's venom is particularly potent. Its bright markings warn of danger.

20004.name: web spinner
20004.long_desc: A large spider works tirelessly, spinning intricate webs.
20004.description: This spider specializes in creating elaborate trap webs.

20005.name: shrine guardian
20005.long_desc: A ghostly figure in ancient armor guards the ruined shrine.
20005.description: This spectral warrior has guarded this shrine for centuries. It attacks only those who disturb the sacred ground.

20006.name: dire wolf
20006.long_desc: A massive dire wolf snarls menacingly at you.
20006.description: This dire wolf is nearly the size of a horse. Its fangs are as long as daggers.

20007.name: spider queen
20007.long_desc: A massive spider queen dominates this chamber, her eyes gleaming with malevolent intelligence.
20007.description: The Spider Queen is ancient and cunning. Countless adventurers have fallen to her venom over the centuries. She guards her lair jealously.

20008.name: alpha wolf
20008.long_desc: The alpha wolf stands guard over its pack, a magnificent and deadly beast.
20008.description: The Alpha Wolf is the undisputed leader of the forest pack. Countless scars mark its grizzled hide, testament to years of dominance.

20001.name: ancient coin
20001.room_desc: An ancient coin lies among the offerings.
20001.description: This coin bears the face of a long-forgotten king. It might be valuable to a collector.

20002.name: spring water
20002.description: This spring provides fresh, clean water. The perfect place to fill a waterskin.

20003.name: spider fang dagger
20003.room_desc: A dagger made from a giant spider's fang lies here.
20003.description: This wicked dagger was crafted from the fang of the Spider Queen. It still drips with venom.

20004.name: web cloak
20004.room_desc: A shimmering cloak woven from spider silk lies here.
20004.description: This cloak is woven from the finest spider silk. It is surprisingly strong and light.

20005.name: wolf fang necklace
20005.room_desc: A necklace of wolf fangs lies here.
20005.description: This necklace is made from the fangs of the Alpha Wolf. It radiates primal power.

20006.name: alpha pelt
20006.room_desc: A magnificent wolf pelt lies here.
20006.description: This thick pelt came from the Alpha Wolf. It would make excellent armor or fetch a high price.

20015.name: cloak of dusk
20015.room_desc: A cloak of dusk lies here.
